original_text: And Paul after this tarried there yet a good while, and then took his leave of the brethren, and sailed thence into Syria, and with him Priscilla and Aquila; having shorn his head in Cenchrea: for he had a vow.
korean_text: 바울은 더 여러 날 머물다가 형제들과 작별하고 배 타고 수리아로 떠나갈새 브리스길라와 아굴라도 함께 하더라 바울이 일찍이 서원이 있었으므로 겐그레아에서 머리를 깎았더라

sentences.original_text: And Paul after this tarried there yet a good while
sentences.korean_translation: 바울은 그 후에 꽤 오랫동안 그곳에 머물렀고

sentences.original_text: and then took his leave of the brethren

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 시리아로 배를 타고 떠났다

sentences.original_text: and with him Priscilla and Aquila
having shorn his head in Cenchrea
